titleStmt.title: A Discourse concerning high treason, or, The Statute of the 25th Edward the Third de proditionibus, considered and explained as also a short treatise of misprision of treason, designed for the instruction of the ignorant that they prove not offensive to the supreme power.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T.B. for Richard Mead,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
